HelpDef.label: Overlays
HelpDef.description: The minimap window can display several different overlays at the same time. Some overlays are hidden (off) by default. You can toggle an entire minimap group on by left-clicking on the icon for the group. You can also toggle individual overlays by right-clicking the group icon and selecting the individual overlay from the menu. Additionally, some overlays have more options than just on/off. These can be accessed through the 'Minimap' mod configuration menu.
